description: A judge rules that a mansion used by Gen Franco belongs to the state and its sale was fraudulent.
title: Spanish dictator Franco's family told to hand back summer palace
title_page: Spanish dictator Franco's family told to hand back summer palace - BBC News
maintext: She ruled that the original gift of the mansion in 1938 had been handed to the "Generalissimo of the armies and head of state" but not in name to Francisco Franco Bahamonde, as he was known.
